#setting up the necessary pacakages 
```{r setup}
install.packages("readtext")
install.packages("quanteda")
install.packages("ggplot2")
library(readtext)
library(quanteda)
library(ggplot2)
```


#getting the txt from 1947 - 2018
```{r}
WB_files <- readtext::readtext("C:\\Users\\44700\\Desktop\\World-Bank-Corpus-Analysis\\Dataset\\Uncleaned_Data")
```


#first trial without removing stopwords and punctuations 
```{r trial}
WB_corpus <- corpus(WB_files,text_field = "text")
stat_read <- textstat_readability(WB_corpus,measure = "Flesch")
stat_read
plot(stat_read$Flesch, type = 'l', xaxt = 'n', xlab = NULL, ylab = "Flesch")
```
